basics.name: Rajat Abhay Sirsikar
basics.label: Engineer, Doctoral Candidate
basics.summary: A Civil Structural Engineer with expertise in Computational mechanics. Experienced in analysis and design of conventional steel structures, pre-engineered buildings, cold-formed structures, and reinforced concrete buildings as per Indian, European, and American codes. Passionate about advancing sustainable and resilient infrastructure through research, consulting, and practical engineering solutions.

location.address: T-28, Third Floor, Block-B, MRC Bhawan, IIT Roorkee

work.name: Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee
work.summary: Computational work on Train-Track-Bridge interaction and its sub-systems

work.name: International Design & Engineering Solutions (IDES), Pune
work.summary: Design of Cold formed Steel structures in WW_US (Worldwide_United States) Team
highlights: Analysis and Design of Light Gauge Steel Framed multi-storied buildings

work.name: Vastustruct, Pune
work.summary: Design of industrial buildings, foundation design, preparation of GA drawings of shed with site visits.
highlights: Analysis and Design of conventional steel structures and reinforced concrete multi-storied buildings

volunteer.organization: Entrepreneurship Development Cell, National Institute of Technology Durgapur

education.institution: Shri Guru Gobind Singhji Institute of Engineering and Technology, Vishnupuri, Nanded
courses: Seismic analysis and design of structures

awards.title: Chartered Engineer (India)
awards.summary: Engineering recognition and acceptance of techno-academic qualification

publications.name: Machine Learning Approaches in Prediction of Railway Bridge Dynamic Response
publications.summary: This study investigates the application of ML algorithms to predict the dynamic acceleration response of railway bridges under high-speed train loads.

publications.name: Parametric Study of Performance-Based Seismic Design of Plan Irregular RC Frames—Indian Scenario
publications.summary: This paper presents a comparative PBSD analysis of G + 4 regular and all five types of plan irregular RC frames using response spectrum and time history methods in Zone IV and Zone V as per IS 1893:2016.

projects.name: Mr. Kaushik Farm House
projects.summary: Structural analysis and design of Hybrid Reinforced concrete-Steel structure
highlights: First project to handle completely from client meetings, design, drawings and site visits
